fields.title: statistical hypothesis testing
fields.pointers:
* Some examples of statistical hypothesis testing:
**  [comparing normal populations](comparing_normal_populations)
* Often, instead of hypothesis testing, it is preferable to compute a  [confidence interval](confidence_interval) .
fields.summary: Statistical hypothesis testing is a method for deciding what conclusions can be drawn from data. A central question is determining whether an outcome is statistically significant, or unlikely to have arisen by chance.
